name: Laundromallard
description:
Wash & dry ducks before they get restless and eat your money. Made for the 2017 Global Game Jam in Groningen, Netherlands.

1-8 players, gamepads* only!

Single-player/co-op: wash & dry as many ducks before they eat your cash.

Versus: dry more ducks than the other team. You each have your own cash.

Questions/remarks? Post them in the comments!

www.blauwprintgames.com | www.3xblast.com

* Xbox 360/One, DualShock 4 with the right drivers or anything simulating it
